definitions.definition: to move something heavy using a lot of effort:
examples: He heaved the bag onto his shoulder

definitions.definition: to throw something forcefully, especially something large and heavy:
examples: She picked up a heavy book and heaved it at him.

definitions.definition: If something heaves, it makes one or more large movements up and down:
examples: As the wind increased, the deck of the ship began to heave beneath his feet.

definitions.definition: the act of throwing, pushing, or pulling something with a lot of effort:
examples: They gave a great heave and rolled the boulder out of the way.
